scripts.dev:sources: concurrently "postcss client/css/ --dir dist/ --watch" "rollup client/viewer.js --file dist/viewer.js --format iife --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve --watch"
scripts.build: postcss client/css/ --dir dist/ && rollup client/viewer.js --file dist/viewer.js --format iife --plugin @rollup/plugin-node-resolve
scripts.deploy:staging: pnpm run build && fly deploy --config fly.staging.toml
scripts.deploy:prod: pnpm run build && fly deploy --config fly.prod.toml
